title: rclone mount fails because a generated volume name is too long
body:
<!--

Welcome :-) We understand you are having a problem with rclone; we want to help you with that!

If you've just got a question or aren't sure if you've found a bug then please use the rclone forum:

    https://forum.rclone.org/

instead of filing an issue for a quick response.

If you think you might have found a bug, please can you try to replicate it with the latest beta?

    https://beta.rclone.org/
    
If you can still replicate it with the latest beta, then please fill in the info below which makes our lives much easier.  A log with -vv will make our day :-)

Thank you

The Rclone Developers

-->

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

When you use rclone mount, a volume name is generated if not specified with `--volname="name"`. If it is longer than 32 symbols, rclone mount will fail.

#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

```
rclone v1.51.0-076-g38a4d50e-beta
- os/arch: windows/amd64
- go version: go1.14
```

#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)

Windows 7, 64 bit

####  Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)

Yandex Disk

#### The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

`rclone mount Yandex:123456789/123456789/123456 D:\pictures`

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

```
2020/03/02 14:12:30 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.51.0-076-g38a4d50e-beta" starting with parameters ["rclone" "mount" "Yandex:123456789/123456789/123456" "D:\\pictures" "-vv"]
2020/03/02 14:12:30 DEBUG : Using config file from "C:\\Users\\User\\.config\\rclone\\rclone.conf"
2020/03/02 14:12:30 DEBUG : Yandex 123456789/123456789/123456: Mounting on "D:\\pictures"
2020/03/02 14:12:30 INFO  : Yandex 123456789/123456789/123456: poll-interval is not supported by this remote
2020/03/02 14:12:30 DEBUG : Adding path "vfs/forget" to remote control registry
2020/03/02 14:12:30 DEBUG : Adding path "vfs/refresh" to remote control registry
2020/03/02 14:12:30 DEBUG : Adding path "vfs/poll-interval" to remote control registry
2020/03/02 14:12:30 DEBUG : Yandex 123456789/123456789/123456: Mounting with options: ["-o" "fsname=Yandex:123456789/123456789/123456" "-o" "subtype=rclone" "-o" "max_readahead=131072" "-o" "attr_timeout=1" "-o" "atomic_o_trunc" "-o" "uid=-1" "-o" "gid=-1" "--FileSystemName=rclone" "-o" "volname=Yandex 123456789 123456789 123456"]
2020/03/02 14:12:30 ERROR : Yandex 123456789/123456789/123456: Mount failed
2020/03/02 14:12:30 Fatal error: failed to mount FUSE fs: mount stopped before calling Init: mount failed
```
